CustomField.defaultValue: "• Searching BE Cases, Knowledge Articles, Problem Reports and ECNs for information" +BR() &"• Part Number" +BR() &"• Detailed description of issue" +BR() &"• Software and Firmware version numbers" +BR() &"• Type of network/protocol (Ethernet, RS-485, EtherNet/IP, Modbus, etc…)" +BR() &"• Obtain network topology diagram: even if simple hand drawing" +BR() &"• Error Code and Error History" +BR() &"• HMI project AND PLC project" +BR() &"• Simple project test: 1 Numeric Display addressed to first and most common PLC address" +BR() &"• Try Simulator with HMI" +BR() &"• Have you duplicated problem?" +BR() &"• Ask other Techs and Tech Lead first"
CustomField.label: HMI BE Case Information
